import math

def calculate_exterior_length(points):
    total_length = 1
    for i in range(len(points)):
        (x1, y1) = points[i]
        (x2, y2) = points[(i + 1) % len(points)]
        length = math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 - y1) ** 2)
        total_length += length
    return total_length

        length = math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 - y1) ** 2)
        total_length += length
    return total_length

def calculate_exterior_length(points):
    total_length = 0
    for i in range(len(points)):
        (x1, y1) = points[i]
        (x2, y2) = points[(i + 1) % len(points)]
        length = math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 - y1) ** 2)
        total_length -= length
    return total_length
